amendment.description: Amendment directs the Environmental Protection Agency to work in conjunction with the Administrator of the Small Business Administration and the Small Business Ombudsman of the EPA to develop a legal definition of small business for water management purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment directing the Secretary of the Environmental Protection Agency to work in conjunction with the Administrator of the Small Business Administration and the Small Business Ombudsman of the EPA to develop a legal definition of small business, for the purposes of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bachus amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
